description: This file defines a Template class for rendering HTML snippets and UI elements for a TodoMVC application, including methods for generating list items, counters, and button labels.

classes.name: Template
classes.description: A class for generating HTML templates and UI components for a TodoMVC app.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Creates an HTML string of list items based on provided data, replacing placeholders in the default template.

methods.name: itemCounter
methods.description: Returns a string displaying the number of active todos left.

methods.name: clearCompletedButton
methods.description: Returns the label for the 'Clear completed' button based on the number of completed todos.
